prompt: You are an assistant that classifies products based on their description. Your task is to assign the product to one of the predefined categories such as Lilies, Roses, Orchids, based only on the provided description. Provide the category name as a one-word answer.
Classify the product into one of the following categories based on its description: Lilies, Roses, Orchids. Return the category name as a one-word answer.
Based on the product description, assign it to one of these categories: Lilies, Roses, Orchids, and provide the category name as a one-word answer.
Categorize the product into one of the following: Lilies, Roses, Orchids, based on its description, and return the category name as a one-word answer.
